mainBoard.name: Gridlock

foreignData.name: Fesselnde Hände
foreignData.text:
Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. Diese Kreatur enttappt nicht während des nächsten Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.
Chiffrieren (Dann kannst du diese Zauberspruchkarte auf eine Kreatur codiert, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken. Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kann ihr Beherrscher eine Kopie der codierten Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreignData.name: Manos vinculantes
foreignData.text: Gira la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. Esa criatura no se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.Cifrar. (Luego puedes exiliar esta carta de hechizo, cifrándola en una criatura que controles. Siempre que esa criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, su controlador puede lanzar una copia de la carta cifrada sin pagar su coste de maná.)

foreignData.name: Mains d'emprisonnement
foreignData.text:
Engagez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. Cette créature ne se dégage pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.
Cryptage (Vous pouvez ensuite exiler cette carte de sort cryptée sur une créature que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, son contrôleur peut lancer une copie de la carte cryptée sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreignData.name: Mani Vincolanti
foreignData.text:
TAPpa una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. Quella creatura non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.
Cifrare (Poi puoi esiliare questa carta magia codificata su una creatura che controlli. Ogniqualvolta quella creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, il suo controllore può lanciare una copia della carta codificata senza pagare il suo costo di mana.)

foreignData.name: 束縛の手
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。そのクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。暗号（その後、あなたはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体に暗号化した状態で、この呪文カードを追放してもよい。そのクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたはその暗号化したカードのコピーを、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。）

foreignData.name: 구속의 손
foreignData.text:
상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다. 그 생물은 조종자의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.
암호문 (그런 다음 당신은 이 주문 카드를 추방하고 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개에 암호화할 수 있다. 그 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 생물의 조종자는 암호화한 카드의 복사본을 마나비용의 지불 없이 발동할 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Mãos Vinculadoras
foreignData.text: Vire uma criatura alvo que um oponente controla. Aquela criatura não desvira durante a próxima etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.Cifrar (Depois, você pode exilar este card de mágica cifrado numa criatura que você controla. Toda vez que aquela criatura causar dano de combate a um jogador, seu controlador poderá conjurar uma cópia do card cifrado sem pagar seu custo de mana.)

foreignData.name: Связующие Руки
foreignData.text:
Поверните целевое существо под контролем оппонента. То существо не разворачивается во время следующего шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.
Шифр (Затем вы можете изгнать эту карту заклинания, закодировав ее на существе под вашим контролем. Каждый раз, когда то существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, контролирующий его игрок может разыграть копию закодированной карты без уплаты ее мана-стоимости.)

foreignData.name: 束缚之手
foreignData.text:
横置目标由对手操控的生物。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。
暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

foreignData.name: 束縛之手
foreignData.text:
橫置目標由對手操控的生物。該生物於其操控者的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。
暗碼（然後你可以放逐此咒語牌，並賦碼於一個由你操控的生物上。每當該生物對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，其操控者可以施放所賦碼之牌的複製品，且不需支付其魔法力費用。）

mainBoard.name: Hands of Binding
mainBoard.originalText:
Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: If a different player gains control of the creature that was tapped by Hands of Binding, Hands of Binding will stop that creature from untapping during its new controller's next untap step.

If the creature that was tapped by Hands of Binding is untapped during its controller's next untap step (perhaps because a spell untapped it), Hands of Binding has no effect at that time. It won't apply at some later time when the creature is tapped.

If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.
If the spell with cipher doesn't resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner's graveyard and won't be encoded on a creature.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can't cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won't get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it's encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won't trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.

The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell's resolution, just after the spell's other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card's type.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn't target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.

mainBoard.text:
Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

mainBoard.name: Death's Approach
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

rulings.text: The value of X will change as the number of creature cards in the enchanted creature’s controller’s graveyard changes. Any time state-based actions are performed, if that creature’s toughness is 0 or less, or damage marked on it is equal to or greater than its toughness, the creature will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Lesser minds can scarcely imagine such a marriage of necromancy and mind magic."
—Strava, Dimir mage

foreignData.flavorText: „Ein geringerer Verstand könnte sich eine solche Vermählung von Nekromagie und Verstandesmagie kaum vorstellen." —Strava, Dimir-Magierin
foreignData.name: Dimir-Schrecken
foreignData.text: {U}: Der Dimir-Schrecken ist bis zum Ende des Zuges fluchsicher. (Er kann nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein, die deine Gegner kontrollieren.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Las mentes inferiores apenas pueden imaginar un matrimonio tal entre la nigromancia y la magia mental."—Strava, maga dimir
foreignData.name: Horror de los Dim
foreignData.text: {U}: El Horror de los Dim gana la habilidad de antimaleficio hasta el final del turno. (No puede ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades que controlan tus oponentes.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Les esprits inférieurs peinent à se représenter un tel mariage entre nécromancie et magie mentale. » —Strava, mage de Dimir
foreignData.name: Horreur de la sombreur
foreignData.text: {U} : L'Horreur de la sombreur acquiert la défense talismanique jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Elle ne peut pas être la cible de sorts ou de capacités que vos adversaires contrôlent.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Le menti deboli possono a malapena immaginare una tale unione di necromanzia e magia mentale." —Strava, maga Dimir
foreignData.name: Orrore dei Dim
foreignData.text: {U}: L'Orrore dei Dim ha anti-malocchio fino alla fine del turno. (Non può essere bersaglio di magie o abilità controllate dai tuoi avversari.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「屍術と精神魔法がこうやって融合されたなんて、出来損ないの頭ではほとんど想像できないでしょうね。」――ディミーアの魔道士、ストラヴァ
foreignData.name: ディミーア家の恐怖
foreignData.text: {U}：ディミーア家の恐怖はターン終了時まで呪禁を得る。（これはあなたの対戦相手がコントロールする呪文や能力の対象にならない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ホラー

foreignData.flavorText: "무식한 놈들은 이런 사령술과 정신 마법의 조합을 상상조차 못하겠지." —디미르 마도사 스트라바
foreignData.name: 디미르 괴수
foreignData.text: {U}: 디미르 괴수는 턴종료까지 방호 능력을 얻는다. (해당 생물은 상대가 조종하는 주문이나 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Mentes inferiores mal podem imaginar tal casamento de necromancia e magia mental."— Strava, maga Dimir
foreignData.name: Horror da Penumbra
foreignData.text: {U}: Horror da Penumbra ganha resistência à magia até o final do turno. (Ele não pode ser alvo de mágicas nem de habilidades que seus oponentes controlam.)

foreignData.flavorText: «Низшие умы вряд ли могут представить себе такой союз некромантии и магии разума». — Страва, маг Димиров
foreignData.name: Ужас Димиров
foreignData.text: {U}: Ужас Димиров получает Порчеустойчивость до конца хода. (Он не может быть целью заклинаний или способностей под контролем ваших оппонентов.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「次等头脑几乎无法想像死灵术和心灵魔法能如此结合。」 ～底密尔法师丝查娃
foreignData.name: 幽暗惧怪
foreignData.text: {U}：幽暗惧怪获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。（它不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「次等頭腦幾乎無法想像死靈術和心靈魔法能如此結合。」 ～底密爾法師絲查娃
foreignData.name: 幽暗懼怪
foreignData.text: {U}：幽暗懼怪獲得辟邪異能直到回合結束。（它不能成為由對手操控之咒語或異能的目標。）

mainBoard.name: Horror of the Dim
mainBoard.originalText: {U}: Horror of the Dim gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
mainBoard.text: {U}: Horror of the Dim gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

foreignData.name: Bewohnerin der Schattenallee
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine andere schwarze Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl Einschüchtern bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Diese Kreatur kann außer von Artefaktkreaturen und/oder Kreaturen, mit denen sie eine Farbe gemeinsam hat, nicht geblockt werden.)

foreignData.name: Habitante de la Calle Sombra
foreignData.text: Siempre que otra criatura negra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, la criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de intimidar hasta el final del turno. (No puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas artefacto y/o criaturas que compartan un color con ella.)

foreignData.name: Habitante de la ruelle des Ombres
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'une autre créature noire arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, une créature ciblée acquiert l'intimidation jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Elle ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures-artefacts et/ou des créatures qui partagent une couleur avec elle.)

foreignData.name: Abitante di Vicolo delle Ombre
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura nera entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, una creatura bersaglio ha intimidire fino alla fine del turno. (Non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature artefatto e/o creature che condividono con essa un colore.)

foreignData.name: 影小道の住人
foreignData.text: 他の黒のクリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで威嚇を得る。（それはアーティファクト・クリーチャーかそれと共通の色を持つクリーチャー以外にはブロックされない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・ならず者

foreignData.name: 그림자 골목 거주민
foreignData.text: 다른 흑색 생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 위협 능력을 얻는다. (이 생물은 마법물체 생물 또는 자신과 색을 공유하는 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Habitante do Beco das Sombras
foreignData.text: Toda vez que outra criatura preta entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, a criatura alvo ganha intimidar até o final do turno. (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas artefato e/ou criaturas que compartilharem uma cor com ela.)

foreignData.name: Жительница Переулка Теней
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда другое черное существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, целевое существо получает Устрашение до конца хода. (Оно может быть заблокировано только артефактными существами и (или) существами, у которых есть такой же цвет, как у него.)

foreignData.name: 暗影巷居民
foreignData.text: 每当另一个黑色生物在你的操控下进战场时，目标生物获得威吓异能直到回合结束。（它只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）

foreignData.name: 暗影巷居民
foreignData.text: 每當另一個黑色生物在你的操控下進戰場時，目標生物獲得威嚇異能直到回合結束。（它只能被神器生物和／或與它有共通顏色的生物阻擋。）

mainBoard.name: Shadow Alley Denizen
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

rulings.text: Shadow Alley Denizen can be chosen as the target of its own ability.
The black creature that entered can be chosen as the target of Shadow Alley Denizen's ability, but it won't be able to attack that turn unless it also has haste.

mainBoard.text: Whenever another black creature you control enters, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

foreignData.name: Schattenschnitz
foreignData.text:
Ein Gegner deiner Wahl verliert 3 Lebenspunkte.
Chiffrieren (Dann kannst du diese Zauberspruchkarte auf eine Kreatur codiert, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken. Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kann ihr Beherrscher eine Kopie der codierten Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreignData.name: Corte sombrío
foreignData.text: El oponente objetivo pierde 3 vidas.Cifrar. (Luego puedes exiliar esta carta de hechizo, cifrándola en una criatura que controles. Siempre que esa criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, su controlador puede lanzar una copia de la carta cifrada sin pagar su coste de maná.)

foreignData.name: Tranche d'ombre
foreignData.text:
L'adversaire ciblé perd 3 points de vie.
Cryptage (Vous pouvez ensuite exiler cette carte de sort cryptée sur une créature que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, son contrôleur peut lancer une copie de la carte cryptée sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreignData.name: Ombre Trancianti
foreignData.text:
Un avversario bersaglio perde 3 punti vita.
Cifrare (Poi puoi esiliare questa carta magia codificata su una creatura che controlli. Ogniqualvolta quella creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, il suo controllore può lanciare una copia della carta codificata senza pagare il suo costo di mana.)

foreignData.name: 影切り
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは３点のライフを失う。暗号（その後、あなたはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体に暗号化した状態で、この呪文カードを追放してもよい。そのクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたはその暗号化したカードのコピーを、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。）

foreignData.name: 그림자 베기
foreignData.text:
상대 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 생명 3점을 잃는다.
암호문 (그런 다음 당신은 이 주문 카드를 추방하고 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개에 암호화할 수 있다. 그 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 생물의 조종자는 암호화한 카드의 복사본을 마나비용의 지불 없이 발동할 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Fatia de Sombra
foreignData.text: O oponente alvo perde 3 pontos de vida.Cifrar (Depois, você pode exilar este card de mágica cifrado numa criatura que você controla. Toda vez que aquela criatura causar dano de combate a um jogador, seu controlador poderá conjurar uma cópia do card cifrado sem pagar seu custo de mana.)

foreignData.name: Атака Теней
foreignData.text:
Целевой оппонент теряет 3 жизни.
Шифр (Затем вы можете изгнать эту карту заклинания, закодировав ее на существе под вашим контролем. Каждый раз, когда то существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, контролирующий его игрок может разыграть копию закодированной карты без уплаты ее мана-стоимости.)

foreignData.name: 暗影削斩
foreignData.text:
目标对手失去3点生命。
暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

foreignData.name: 暗影削斬
foreignData.text:
目標對手失去3點生命。
暗碼（然後你可以放逐此咒語牌，並賦碼於一個由你操控的生物上。每當該生物對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，其操控者可以施放所賦碼之牌的複製品，且不需支付其魔法力費用。）

mainBoard.name: Shadow Slice
mainBoard.originalText:
Target opponent loses 3 life.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.
If the spell with cipher doesn’t resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner’s graveyard and won’t be encoded on a creature.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can’t cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won’t get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it’s encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won’t trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.

The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell’s resolution, just after the spell’s other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn’t target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.

mainBoard.text:
Target opponent loses 3 life.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

foreignData.name: Ruf der Nachtschwinge
foreignData.text:
Bringe einen 1/1 blauen und schwarzen Schrecken-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.
Chiffrieren (Dann kannst du diese Zauberspruchkarte auf eine Kreatur codiert, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken. Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kann ihr Beherrscher eine Kopie der codierten Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreignData.name: Llamada del ala nocturna
foreignData.text: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Horror azul y negra 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.Cifrar. (Luego puedes exiliar esta carta de hechizo, cifrándola en una criatura que controles. Siempre que esa criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, su controlador puede lanzar una copia de la carta cifrada sin pagar su coste de maná.)

foreignData.name: Appel de l'ailenuit
foreignData.text:
Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 bleue et noire Horreur avec le vol.
Cryptage (Vous pouvez ensuite exiler cette carte de sort cryptée sur une créature que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, son contrôleur peut lancer une copie de la carte cryptée sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreignData.name: Richiamo dell'Ala Notturna
foreignData.text:
Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Orrore 1/1 blu e nera con volare.
Cifrare (Poi puoi esiliare questa carta magia codificata su una creatura che controlli. Ogniqualvolta quella creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, il suo controllore può lanciare una copia della carta codificata senza pagare il suo costo di mana.)

foreignData.name: 夜翼の呼び声
foreignData.text: 飛行を持つ青であり黒である１/１のホラー・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。暗号（その後、あなたはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体に暗号化した状態で、この呪文カードを追放してもよい。そのクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたはその暗号化したカードのコピーを、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。）

foreignData.name: 밤날개의 부름
foreignData.text:
비행 능력을 가졌고 청색이자 흑색인 1/1 괴수 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
암호문 (그런 다음 당신은 이 주문 카드를 추방하고 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개에 암호화할 수 있다. 그 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 생물의 조종자는 암호화한 카드의 복사본을 마나비용의 지불 없이 발동할 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Chamado do Noctóptero
foreignData.text: Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura azul e preta 1/1 do tipo Horror com voar.Cifrar (Depois, você pode exilar este card de mágica cifrado numa criatura que você controla. Toda vez que aquela criatura causar dano de combate a um jogador, seu controlador poderá conjurar uma cópia do card cifrado sem pagar seu custo de mana.)

foreignData.name: Зов Ночного Крыла
foreignData.text:
Положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 синий и черный Ужас с Полетом.
Шифр (Затем вы можете изгнать эту карту заклинания, закодировав ее на существе под вашим контролем. Каждый раз, когда то существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, контролирующий его игрок может разыграть копию закодированной карты без уплаты ее мана-стоимости.)

foreignData.name: 夜翼呼唤
foreignData.text:

暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

mainBoard.name: Call of the Nightwing
mainBoard.originalText:
Put a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: You can exile Call of the Nightwing encoded on the Horror creature token it just created.

If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.
If the spell with cipher doesn’t resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner’s graveyard and won’t be encoded on a creature.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can’t cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won’t get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it’s encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won’t trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.

The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell’s resolution, just after the spell’s other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn’t target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.

mainBoard.text:
Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Dimir's best agents hide from death itself.

foreignData.flavorText: Die besten Dimir-Agenten verbergen sich sogar vor dem Tod.
foreignData.name: Schreitende Tote
foreignData.text: Wenn die Schreitende Tote stirbt, bringe sie auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Los mejores agentes de los dimir se ocultan hasta de la propia muerte.
foreignData.name: Montaraz mortus
foreignData.text: Cuando el Montaraz mortus muera, regrésalo a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Les meilleurs agents de Dimir savent échapper à la mort elle-même.
foreignData.name: Enjambeur mortus
foreignData.text: Quand l'Enjambeur mortus meurt, renvoyez-le dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: I migliori agenti Dimir sanno nascondersi dalla morte stessa.
foreignData.name: Mortus Errante
foreignData.text: Quando il Mortus Errante muore, fallo tornare in mano al suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: ディミーアで一番腕の立つ工作員は、死からも身を隠す。
foreignData.name: 薨の徘徊者
foreignData.text: 薨の徘徊者が死亡したとき、これをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スケルトン

foreignData.flavorText: 디미르 길드의 가장 뛰어난 요원들은 죽음조차 피할 수 있다.
foreignData.name: 사지를 걷는 자
foreignData.text: 사지를 걷는 자가 죽을 때, 사지를 걷는 자를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os melhores agentes dos Dimir se escondem da própria morte.
foreignData.name: Andarilho Mortus
foreignData.text: Quando Andarilho Mortus morrer, devolva-o para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: Лучшие агенты Димиров могут спрятаться даже от самой смерти.
foreignData.name: Шатун Смерти
foreignData.text: Когда Шатун Смерти умирает, верните его в руку его владельца.

foreignData.flavorText: 底密尔的最佳密探连死亡都能避开。
foreignData.name: 跨行亡者
foreignData.text: 当跨行亡者死去时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

foreignData.flavorText: 底密爾的最佳密探連死亡都能避開。
foreignData.name: 跨行亡者
foreignData.text: 當跨行亡者死去時，將它移回其擁有者手上。

mainBoard.name: Mortus Strider
mainBoard.originalText: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Mortus Strider will return to its owner's hand only if it is still in the graveyard when its ability resolves.

mainBoard.text: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The hussars can't catch him, and he evades our traps with ease. I fear he walks unseen even in the halls of New Prahv."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Husaren können ihn nicht erwischen, und unseren Fallen weicht er mit Leichtigkeit aus. Ich fürchte, er wandert sogar ungesehen durch die Hallen von Neu-Pravh." —Eintreiberin Lavinia, Zehntes Revier
foreignData.name: Todeskult-Räuber
foreignData.text: Der Todeskult-Räuber kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von Räubern.

foreignData.flavorText: "Los húsares no pueden atraparlo y elude nuestras trampas con facilidad. Me temo que camina sin ser visto incluso en los salones de Nueva Prahv."—Encarceladora Lavinia, distrito décimo
foreignData.name: Bribón del culto mortal
foreignData.text: El Bribón del culto mortal no puede ser bloqueado excepto por Bribones.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il file entre les doigts des hussards et échappe aisément à nos pièges. Je crains qu'il passe inaperçu jusque dans les halls du Nouveau Prahv. » —Courtière Lavinia, Dixième circonscription
foreignData.name: Gredin morteculte
foreignData.text: Le Gredin morteculte ne peut être bloqué que par des gredins.

foreignData.flavorText: "Gli ussari non riescono a prenderlo ed evita le nostre trappole con facilità. Temo che cammini indisturbato persino nelle sale del Nuovo Prahv." —Lavinia, polizia del Decimo Distretto
foreignData.name: Farabutto del Culto di Morte
foreignData.text: Il Farabutto del Culto di Morte non può essere bloccato tranne che da Farabutti.

foreignData.flavorText: 「軽騎兵では捕まえられないし、罠も簡単にすり抜けられてしまう。新プラーフの廊下でさえ気づかれずに歩いているのかも。」――第10管区の拘引者、ラヴィニア
foreignData.name: 死教団のならず者
foreignData.text: 死教団のならず者はならず者によってしかブロックされない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: "그 놈은 우리의 경기병도 피해다니고 함정도 쉽게 탈출한다. 혹시 뉴 프라브 안에서도 마음대로 돌아다니는게 아닌지 걱정이군." —10번 관할지역 체포원 라비니아
foreignData.name: 죽음숭배단 도적
foreignData.text: 죽음숭배단 도적은 도적에게만 방어될 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Os hussardos não conseguem capturá-lo, e ele escapa de nossas armadilhas com facilidade. Receio que ele caminhe sem ser visto mesmo nos salões de Nova Prahv."— Encarceradora Lavínia, Décima Jurisdição
foreignData.name: Ladino do Culto da Morte
foreignData.text: Ladino do Culto da Morte só pode ser bloqueado por Ladinos.

foreignData.flavorText: «Гусары его схватить не могут, все наши ловушки он с легкостью обходит. Может, он свободно разгуливает по залам Нового Права — а мы ничего не знаем». — Задержатель Лавиния, Десятый Округ
foreignData.name: Разбойник Культа Смерти
foreignData.text: Разбойник Культа Смерти может быть заблокирован только Бродягами.

foreignData.flavorText: 「轻骑兵无法捉住他，而他也能轻易避开我们的陷阱。我恐怕即使在新布拉夫的大厅之中，他也能来去自如。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉温妮
foreignData.name: 杀生宗浪客
foreignData.text: 杀生宗浪客只能被浪客阻挡。

foreignData.flavorText: 「輕騎兵無法捉住他，而他也能輕易避開我們的陷阱。我恐怕即使在新布拉夫的大廳之中，他也能來去自如。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉溫妮
foreignData.name: 殺生宗浪客
foreignData.text: 殺生宗浪客只能被浪客阻擋。

mainBoard.name: Deathcult Rogue
mainBoard.originalText: Deathcult Rogue can't be blocked except by Rogues.

rulings.text: If a creature already assigned to block Deathcult Rogue stops being a Rogue, it will continue to block.

mainBoard.text: Deathcult Rogue can't be blocked except by Rogues.

mainBoard.flavorText: Enter and become a mastermind of spies, lies, and deception.

foreignData.flavorText: Tritt ein und lerne Täuschung, Spionieren sowie Lug und Trug.
foreignData.name: Dimir-Gildeneingang
foreignData.text:
Der Dimir-Gildeneingang kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U} oder {B}.

foreignData.flavorText: Únete y conviértete en un maestro de espías, del engaño y las mentiras.
foreignData.name: Portal del Gremio Dimir
foreignData.text: El Portal del Gremio Dimir entra al campo de batalla girado.{T}: Agrega {U} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.

foreignData.flavorText: Entrez pour devenir maître de l'espionnage, du mensonge et de la tromperie.
foreignData.name: Porte de la guilde de Dimir
foreignData.text:
La Porte de la guilde de Dimir arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B} à votre réserve.

foreignData.flavorText: Entrate per diventare creatori di spie, inganni e trucchi.
foreignData.name: Cancello della Gilda Dimir
foreignData.text:
Il Cancello della Gilda Dimir entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: ここに入れ。それが諜報、ぼう略、詐欺の達人となる道。
foreignData.name: ディミーアのギルド門
foreignData.text: ディミーアのギルド門はタップ状態で戦場に出る。{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}か{B}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 이 문에 들어오는 자는 첩보, 거짓, 그리고 기만의 대가가 될 것이다.
foreignData.name: 디미르 길드관문
foreignData.text:
디미르 길드관문은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {U}나 {B}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Entre e associe-se à nossa seleta casta de espiões, ludibriadores e manipuladores.
foreignData.name: Portão da Guilda Dimir
foreignData.text: Portão da Guilda Dimir entra no campo de batalha virado.{T}: Adicione {U} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: Здесь становятся гениями шпионажа, уловок и подлога.
foreignData.name: Врата Гильдии Димиров
foreignData.text:
Врата Гильдии Димиров выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
{T}: добавьте {U} или {B} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignData.flavorText: 此门将助有志者成为谍报、谎言和欺骗大师。
foreignData.name: 底密尔公会门
foreignData.text:
底密尔公会门须横置进战场。
{T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

foreignData.flavorText: 此門將助有志者成為諜報、謊言和欺騙大師。
foreignData.name: 底密爾公會門
foreignData.text:
底密爾公會門須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{U}或{B}到你的魔法力池中。

mainBoard.name: Dimir Guildgate
mainBoard.originalText:
Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: Gate is not a basic land type.
The subtype Gate has no special rules significance, but other spells and abilities may refer to it.
